items.sentence: My parents wouldn\'t let me date who I wanted to date.
I may be able to come to your office Monday afternoon.
I never get tired of watching Tom and Mary play darts.
I received three threatening phone calls this morning.
I\'ve got something in my bag that I need to give you.
I\'ve written his address on the back of the envelope.
It would be nice if you could get here a little early.
It would be useless to try to convince Tom to help us.
It would take at least three hours to paint this room.
The washing machine still doesn\'t seem to be working.
The weatherman says that it\'ll rain in the afternoon.
My doctor has advised me to stop taking this medicine.
My father always reads the newspaper before breakfast.
My father took out his wallet and gave me ten dollars.
My grandmother always said it was a sin to waste food.
Tom appreciates everything that Mary has done for him.
Tom arrived at school earlier than usual this morning.
Tom asked Mary if she spoke more than three languages.
Tom asked Mary not to play the drums so late at night.
Tom became anorexic when he was a high school student.
